level.heading: RESTRICTIONS ON USE OF EMPLOYEES AND EQUIPMENT (ยง 15-3907)

level.text: An electric company is prohibited from sharing employees with an affiliate.

An energy utility and an affiliate may share the same telecommunications system or computer system, so long as adequate security and system protections are in place to prevent the accessing of information or data of the energy utility by the affiliate that would be in violation of other provisions of this Chapter.
An electric company shall not temporarily assign any employee of the electric company to an affiliate.
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 1109, 1114 (February 4, 2011).
